altername_name: Honkakuha Bass Fishing Game: Lake Masters
name: Lake Masters
overview: Lake Masters is a fishing game with four game modes: -Tournament -Lake make -Free mode -Versus mode The player can play in differents lakes like Water Melon, Kissimmee etc. Manufacturer's description: Reproduced on a grand game of nature, full of realistic Basufisshingugemu the best of bass fishing. Shape and depth of the lake, free to place obstacles on 3D Reikumeikumodo fishing, catch a bus with more than the other VS mode. To move freely while riding a boat to the lake, aiming point ?Ri?Geyou exquisite bus.
